lead_paragraph: Jerry Colangelo won't seek a third term as chairman of USA Basketball, instead focusing on his role as managing director of the men's national team program.

headline.print_headline: Colangelo to Leave USAB Chair Role, Will Focus on Men's Team
headline.main: Colangelo to Leave USAB Chair Role, Will Focus on Men's Team

snippet: Jerry Colangelo won't seek a third term as chairman of USA Basketball, instead focusing on his role as managing director of the men's national team program....
